main.name: Muhammad
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Muhammad Sani and I am a software engineer with 2 years of experience in the field. I have honed my skills in various technologies including but not limited to ReactJS, NextJS, React Native, NodeJS, NestJS, GraphQL, REST API(s), MySQL and MongoDB. I am passionate about using technologies to build efficient and user-friendly solutions. My experience in these technologies has allowed me to work on projects that have had impact positive impact on both users and the companies I have worked for. I am constantly seeking new opportunities to learn and grow as a software engineer and to continue to contribute my skills to challenging and fulfilling projects.

address.street: No.5 Alexander St. Brains & Hammers Lifecamp

work.title: Fullstack Software Developer
work.description: Developed and maintained multiple applications using ReactJS, React Native, Redux, NestJS, NextJS and Typescript to create a dynamic user experience with optimal performance

work.title: Web Developer - Intern
work.description: Deigned and Developed several software applications using HTML, CSS, PHP and MYSQL
